title: Hanging, "Naushon Island Salt Marches", 1926–59
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist (batik) applied by brush on plain weave; lined with plain weave
signed: Artist's monogram in lower right-hand corner: LB-BH
description: View from land across the bay with small islands and boats in the distance. Land in shades of yellow with orange trees set off against a grey sky. Small flowers in narrow border on four sides. Signed in the lower right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Naushon Island Salt Marches", 1926–59.Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist (batik) applied by brush on plain weave; lined with plain weave. 1977-112-4.
